title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure and components of the distributed constraint solver system.

title: Design Cluster Communication Protocol
description: Create a protocol for communication between nodes in the distributed cluster.

title: Implement Node Initialization Module
description: Develop the module responsible for initializing each node in the distributed cluster.

title: Develop Data Transfer Mechanisms
description: Create mechanisms for transferring problem data across the distributed cluster.

title: Create Constraint Solver Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms for solving constraint satisfaction problems.

title: Design User Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for submitting and visualizing problem results.

title: Develop API for Problem Submission
description: Create an API for users to submit constraint satisfaction problems.

title: Write Test Cases for Constraint Solver Algorithms
description: Develop test cases to verify the correctness of constraint solver algorithms.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create documentation for users to understand how to use the system.

title: Perform System Testing
description: Test the system as a whole to ensure it functions correctly.
dependencies: Write Test Cases for Constraint Solver Algorithms
